definition.featurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="feature_container" x="-22" y="89"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_disk"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"/><field name="half_height">2</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This block represents a disk of sand.</comment><value name="target"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><comment h="80" pinned="true" w="160">The disk can only replace grass and dirt</comment><value name="blockSet"><block inline="true" type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"/><field name="block0">CUSTOM:Blackcobblestone</field></block></value></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">0</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">The disk has a radius between 2 and 6.</comment></block></value><value name="fallback"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"/><field name="block">CUSTOM:MoltenLavacobblestone</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This is the default block used for the disk.</comment></block></value><value name="rule0"><block inline="false" type="disk_rule"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Place sandstone instead of sand if the block below it is air.</comment><value name="if_true"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block inline="true" type="block_holderset_list"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"/><field name="block0">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value><value name="then"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"/><field name="block">CUSTOM:MoltenLavacobblestone</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Each chunk will try to generate 3 disks of sand</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This moves the feature so that it doesn't generate in the corner only</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We try to generate the feature on the ocean floor</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Prevents the feature from generating in other biomes</comment><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">80</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">90</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter" x="516" y="443"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We try to generate the feature only in water</comment><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_matching_fluids"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="fluid">LAVA</field></block></value></block></xml>
